extendedInfo.description: With the simple yet attractive interface, tipping is now faster and easier. Best of all, its completely FREE with NO ADVERTISEMENTS and requires NO PERMISSIONS!â¢  Share & Split The Bill â¢  Supports All Currenciesâ¢  Fully Customizableâ¢  Dynamic Real Time ResultsHow To Use1) Tap the number next to "Bill" to enter the bill amount.2) Use the "+" or "-" buttons or drag your finger across the bar to select a tip percent and how many people are splitting the bill. You can also tap on the number itself to input your own.3) Tap on the drop down next to "Tax" to select the amount (given on the bill to add to the final price) or the tax rate then tap on the number to input your value.Tips & Tricksâ¢  Tap on the tip or split number to enter your own value without having to slider your fingerâ¢  Tap anywhere on the screen or on the sliders to hide your keyboardâ¢  Tap on "Amount" next to the tax to select the rateâ¢  Set defaults, customizations, interface options, and get developer support with the settings buttonâ¢  Share button formats text based on your selection and changes based on group size and preferences

reviews.comment: Great app. Logo sucks though.
reviews.author: Charles Daly

reviews.title: Just simple
reviews.comment: Some times simple is better and this is the case here. Simply perfect!
reviews.author: Mario Hernandez

reviews.comment: Still at 5.0! Keep it up.
reviews.author: Luqmaan Mathee

reviews.comment: Superb. Where do I donate
reviews.author: Derrick Ilgner

reviews.comment: This is really great
reviews.author: Luke Mattson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Simple, easy to use interface. I look forward to seeing more apps developed. Great job!
reviews.author: Andrew Quebe

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent and very useful app. Very nicely done. I like the fact that no special permissions were needed. Donation very well earned.
reviews.author: J Pan

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Easy and simple app....looking more apps from u guys ..always support ...thks
reviews.author: Chanzian Ziansing

reviews.title: Amazingly useful app
reviews.comment: This app is a perfect tip calculator. The UI is incredibly easy to use and looks clean and beautiful. Very useful app. I highly recommend this app
reviews.author: Shubham Kulkarni

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love the design and the split idea is great as I find myself in situations where it\'s more than just one person to split the bill with.
reviews.author: Puleen Patel

reviews.title: Accurate, quick, excellent all around
reviews.comment: Finally, an app that can maintain simple functionality while keeping its style. It\'s a simple yet very important app that I would highly recommend.
reviews.author: Brendan Carrillo

reviews.title: Sleek, Simple Tip Calculator
reviews.comment: This actually replaced my favorite tip calculator as it is simpler, has no ads, and the interface is quick on-the-go accessible. What are you waiting for? Download it already!  Great job, Collin! (Developer)
reviews.author: Willie D. Washington

reviews.title: Seems straight forward.
reviews.comment: Installed, looks good though if you make any setting changes then go back out to the interface the interface looks distorted until you exit out of the app then go back in.  No biggie though.
reviews.author: Scott Hirschman

reviews.title: Simple, and gets the job done!
reviews.comment: Especially like the 4.0+ theme.
reviews.author: David Roth

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: It does what it says, layout is simple and clean and no ads + free. Great work
reviews.author: Nick Tursi

reviews.title: Clean-simple-fast-accurate and it\'s totally free!
reviews.comment: 5stars! God bless u collin!
reviews.author: Leio Rush

reviews.title: Beautifully designed
reviews.comment: Works great without ads, permissions. Very nice app.
reviews.author: Tarik Husejinovic

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Now I can figure my tip based on the pre-tax total *and then* add the tax into the total! It really is sleek, easy and fast!!
reviews.author: Lorri M

reviews.title: Great app, no permissions!
reviews.comment: Thanks!
reviews.author: Tonia Addison-Hall

reviews.comment: Simple yet genius
reviews.author: Raed Sweiss
